00025 class Indicator : public ObservableObject {
00026     public:
00027         
00028 
00029         
00031         enum IndicatorAlignment {
00032             Left = 0,   // order must not be changed
00033             Center = 1,
00034             Right = 2
00035         };
00037         typedef INT IndicatorPosition;
00038 
00040         Indicator(IndicatorPosition pos, IndicatorAlignment align);
00041 
00043         void SetAlignment(IndicatorAlignment align);
00044 
00046         IndicatorAlignment GetAlignment() const { return m_data.align; }
00047 
00049         void SetPosition(IndicatorPosition pos);
00050 
00052         IndicatorPosition GetPosition() const   { return m_pos; }
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056 
00058         Indicator(); 
00059 
00061         void Init(const IndicatorID& indicatorId, const IndicatorDescription* desc = 0);
00062 
00064         void SetIndicatorDescription(const IndicatorDescription *desc);
00065 
00067         const IndicatorDescription *GetIndicatorDescription() const { return m_description; }
00068 
00070         virtual ~Indicator();
00071 
00073         virtual Size GetSize() const = 0;
00074 
00076         void SetVisible(BOOLEAN flag);
00077 
00078 
00080         virtual BOOLEAN IsVisible() const { return m_data.visible; }
00081 
00083         virtual void Draw(DeviceContext* dc, Point pos, Rect draw_rect) = 0;
00084         
00086         const IndicatorID &GetId() const { return m_indicator_id; };
00087 
00088     private:
00089 
00090         struct {
00091             UINT    visible : 2;
00092             IndicatorAlignment  align : 3;  //OBSOLETE SINCE 1.21
00093 
00094         } m_data;
00095         
00096         IndicatorID             m_indicator_id;
00097         const IndicatorDescription* m_description;
00098         
00099         IndicatorPosition   m_pos;
00100 };
